title: Kai Byoui Ramune (Dr. Ramune -Mysterious Disease Specialist-)
synopsis: As long as hearts exist inside people, there will always be those who suffer. And then something "strange" enters their mind and causes a strange disease to manifest itself in the body. The illness, which is called a "mystery disease" is unknown to most, but certainly exists. There is a doctor and apprentice who fights the disease, which modern medicine cannot cure.
voices: ['Uchida, Yuuma', 'Nagatsuka, Takuma', 'Murase, Ayumu', 'Ueda, Kana', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Sasaki, Hitomi', 'Shimazaki, Nobunaga', 'KENN', 'Kitou, Akari']
staff: [['Ooba, Hideaki', ['Director']], ['Takakuwa, Hajime', ['Sound Director']], ['Hisao, Ayumu', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Uchida, Yuuma', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
